epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    The client that send normal requests to the server
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade

        Returns:
